SEARCH
Package linkia.dam.whatacookrecipes.service.repository

Interface MeasureDao

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.reactive.ReactiveCrudRepository<MeasureDto,String>, org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.ReactiveMongoRepository<MeasureDto,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.ReactiveQueryByExampleExecutor<MeasureDto>, org.springframework.data.repository.reactive.ReactiveSortingRepository<MeasureDto,String>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<MeasureDto,String>
@Repository public interface MeasureDao extends org.springframework.data.mongodb.repository.ReactiveMongoRepository<MeasureDto,String>
Repository interface for managing MeasureDto entities. Extends the ReactiveMongoRepository to provide reactive CRUD operations.

Method: - findByNameIgnoreCase(String name): Finds a measure by name, case insensitive.

Annotations: - @Repository: Indicates that this interface is a Spring Data Repository.

See Also:

    • findByNameIgnoreCase

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<MeasureDto> findByNameIgnoreCase(String name)
      Finds a measure by name, case insensitive.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the measure to search for.
      Returns:
      A Mono emitting the matching MeasureDto entity, or empty if not found.
